website_summaries.verdict: Backed by a reputable clothing brand, this relaxed fit flannel shirt is a stylish and comfortable choice that men are sure to enjoy.
pros: Fabric has been preshrunk to allow for easy washing and drying
This shirt is a more lightweight flannel that is perfect for layering or to wear when the temperature is milder
Comes in many different colors and patterns
cons: Shirt may become wrinkled in the wash and require ironing

customer_reviews.title: I recommend washing and hanging up to dry
customer_reviews.text: I chose the size XL knowing that cotton flannel shrinks. Among all the choices, I chose this shirt based on the description that the fabric was "pre-shrunk". After the first wash/dry, the width and the sleeves didn't not shrink but the body of the shirt shortened significantly. I recommend washing and hanging up to dry. The descriptor, unfortunately is inaccurate. Although it's made well, I would expect Bass to sell a product that if preshrunk, would be.
customer_reviews.author: C. Landers

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirts
customer_reviews.text: The fit is awesome! By that I mean that I listened to the reviewers and purchased a medium. I am 5'8" 165 lb. My neck is 16" and my sleeve length is 33". I have an athletic build. I will only buy fitted shirts and I typically purchase a large to accommodate my neck, chest and shoulders. Length is always an issue because I am less than standard height. This shirt is not too long, (although it is borderline). The sleeves fit well and the body is perfect. The fabric is somewhat light, which makes it perfect for the mid-west plains states that don't have extreme temps. As soon as I received the first one I immediately bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Frymyer

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the product! Fits slightly bigger, but I'm expecting this to shrink slightly. I bought a L and I'm 6'2" - and I weight about 180 lbs. For body size, I'd say I have broader shoulders and average waist / torso. In addition, I like that it's slightly lighter-weight flannel. I shall be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Enrico C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft comfortable flannel, great looking colors, relaxed fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderfully comfortable flannel shirt. the flannel is thin but not too much so - Keeps my nice and warm indoors. The colors are wonderful - vibrant good looking colors and a really large selection. The shirt provides plenty of room for moving around - It's not at all a fitted shirt. So if you don't like shirt that bind in the torso or shoulders when you move, this shirt will satisfy your need for comfort.

customer_reviews.title: ... give this 4 stars because it looks and feels like it would be a great shirt

At about $26, these are a steal.

I've worn this shirt in 98 degree weather with no issues and it kept the sun off. I can see wearing this shirt down to about 50 degrees while active and as a comfortable under layer to jackets beyond that. It's a very versatile and stylish piece of clothing and I can see why these shirts are so timeless.
